La Esperanza group is on its 13th cycle of the women's committee program. They live in the city of Itá, where they all work and help one another. They are participating in the elimination of poverty survey, working hard to grow and get ahead.
Jacky is one of the members. She makes copies and prepares computer projects for other people. She says that thanks to her work she is able to provide a decent life for her family. She is a hard-working woman and she wants to get ahead. She is asking for this loan to buy ink, paper and other products to continue offering a good service to her customers. She is thankful for this opportunity to continue to grow and get ahead.

loans.use: to buy paper and ink for diferent work orders and photocopies

loans.name: Ramona

texts.es:
La Sra. Ramona tiene 48 años, está casada hace más de 25 años con el Sr. José con quien tiene 4 hijos, todos ya mayores, que pudieron sacar adelante por medio de su esfuerzo y sacrificio.
La  Sra. Ramona y José se casaron muy jóvenes y empezaron a trabajar en Argentina durante muchos años es ahí donde juntaron un poco de dinero para poder volver a su país y construir  una casa propia que tanto soñaban, ya que la señora es costurera montaron un taller de costura donde confecciona todo tipo de ropas, hace mas de 10 años que se dedica a este  trabajo y gracias a esta actividad y el esfuerzo de los dos los hijos están en la  universidad.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar una máquina de coser, de manera a poder seguir con sus confecciones y cumplir con sus clientes de esta manera poder cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en: Ramona is 48 years old, and has been married for 25 years to Jose. Together they have 4 grown children whom they raised with great effort and sacrifice. Ramona and Jose married very young, and then worked in Argentina for many years. There they saved a bit of money to return to their country and build the house of their own that they had dreamed of. Because she is a seamstress she started a sewing business where she makes all kinds of clothing. She has done this work for more than 10 years, and thanks to this activity and her efforts her children are at university. She is requesting a loan to be able to buy a sewing machine, so that she can continue making clothing and fulfill her customers orders.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Señoras Unidas Group

texts.es:
El grupo lleva por nombre Señoras Unidas, ellas se encuentran dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, esforzándose y luchando para poder mejorar las condiciones de vida de sus familias.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Luciana, quien se dedica al humilde trabajo de venta de remedios naturales, comenta que por medio de su humilde trabajo tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia, Luciana es una mujer muy sacrificada que pone todo de sí para poder crecer y salir adelante.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar remedios naturales para la venta, y de esa manera seguir luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus seres queridos.
texts.en: The group is called Women United, and is part of the poverty elimination program. They strive and struggle to improve the living conditions for themselves and their families. One of the members is Luciana, who does the humble work of selling natural remedies. She says that through the humble work that she does she has the means to be able to help her family. Luciana is a woman who sacrifices and gives all of her self to be able to grow and get ahead. She is requesting this loan to buy natural remedies to sell. In this way she can continue striving to improve the living conditions for herself and her loved ones.

loans.use: to buy natural remedies to sell.

loans.name: Madres Luchadoras Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Madres Luchadoras está en su ciclo número 2 del programa de comité de mujeres, son 18 mujeres que integran este grupo para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
La señora Maxima, es una madre luchadora y posee una actividad el cual realiza  para el sostenimiento de su hogar y de su familia que se trata de la elaboración de chipa y también su posterior venta, el cual es un alimento típico paraguayo que se vende en toda estación del año.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar harina, almidón, queso, huevo, manteca y otros insumos para poder seguir con la elaboración y venta de chipas. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder crecer y mejorar.
texts.en:
Madres Luchadoras group is on its 2nd cycle of the women's committee program. There are 18 women in the group working to improve their living conditions.
Maxima is a hard-working mother. She works to support her household and her family making and selling chipa, a typical food from Paraguay that can be sold any time of the year.
She is asking for this loan to buy supplies such as flour, starch, cheese, eggs, butter and other items to make and sell chipas. She is thankful for the opportunity she gets to grow and get ahead.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make chipas such as flour, starch, cheese, eggs, butter and other items

loans.name: Fred

texts.en:
Fred, 48 and married, lives in his own house with his wife, in Lyantonde district, western Uganda. Fred has very good personal and work references from the residents of the area. The inhabitants of this town work mostly in agriculture, especially cattle farming.

He works in agriculture, specifically cattle rearing and fattening. He is located in the rural area, and has 10 years of cattle rearing experience. He will use the loan granted to him to buy stock of baby cows that he will fatten and later sell at a good price. He will also buy fodder to boost the feed, so that he will increase yields. In this manner, it will help him improve the productiveness of his animals. He will have better production, a better quality product, and for these reasons won't have problems selling his product.

loans.use: to buy cattle to trade.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter 38 years old and married with three children. He sells clothes, a business he has run for seven years. He has requested a loan, which he will be using to purchase additional supplies of jerseys, coats and sweaters to sell during this rainy season.

His hopes and dreams for the future are to have a profitable business and educate his children to higher level.

loans.use: to purchase additional supplies of jerseys, coats and sweaters to sell during this rainy season.

loans.name: Eladio

texts.es:
Eladio con 43 años de edad, de estado civil casado,vive en casa propia,junto a su esposa y sus hijas, en el distrito de Lagunas,provincia de Chiclayo,país Perú. El cuneta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la actividad de crianza de ganado vacuno y venta de leche, con una experiencia en el rubro desde hace más de 15 años, en su propio domicilio. Solicita préstamo para la compra de una picadora para procesar el alimento del ganado. De esta manera hacer crecer más su negocio, obtener más ingresos y poder mejorar su calidad de vida.

Eladio es socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa. Ha tenido un préstamo de S/.1,500.00 el cuál lo canceló de manera puntual.
texts.en:
Eladio is 43 years old. He is married and he lives in a house that he owns with his wife and two daughters in the district of Lagunas, province of Chiclayo, Perú. He has great personal and work-related references from his neighbors in the area. Most people in the town work in agriculture, commerce and raising livestock.
He works raising cattle and selling milk. He has more than 15 years of experience in the field and he works out of his home. He is asking for this loan to buy a mincer to process livestock products. This way he can grow his business and get a better income to be able to improve his quality of life.
Eladio is a recurring member of Edpyme Alternativa. He's had a previous loan for S/.1,500.00, which he was able to pay on time without problems.

loans.use: to buy a mincer to process livestock products.

loans.name: Salustiana

texts.es:
La señora Salustiana es de la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo, está casada, y tiene 3 hijos, ella hace más de 15 años  cuenta con una despensa, donde vende todo tipo de productos, el cual es el sustento de la familiar.
La pareja, tanto ella como su marido trabajan y de esa manera se ayudan para poder dar una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
Salustiana pide este préstamo para la compra de productos variados para la venta, como ser: arroz, fideos, harina, azúcar, sal, aceite, entre otros, para poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Salustiana lives in Coronel Oviedo. She is married with 3 children and she's had a grocery store for more than 15 years selling a large variety of products. The business supports her family.
She, as well as her husband, both work hard to help one another to provide for their children and improve their quality of life.
Salustiana is asking for a loan to buy a variety of products such as rice, noodles, sugar, salt, oil and other products to continue increasing her sales as she's done thus far.

loans.use: to buy rice, noodles, sugar, salt, oil and other products

loans.name: Clemente Pascual

texts.es:
Clemente con 45 años de edad,de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia, junto a su esposa y sus hijos, en el distrito de Zaña,provincia de Chiclayo,departamento de Lambayeque,país Perú.El cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la actividad de crianza y venta de animales como chivos y borregos, con una experiencia en el rubro desde hace más de 15 años, en su propio domicilio. Solicita préstamo para la compra de animales y alimento para los mismos. De esta manera hacer crecer más su negocio, obtener más ingresos y poder mejorar si calidad de vida.

Clemente es socio nuevo para Edpyme Alternativa.Ha tenido tres préstamos,el último fué de S/.1,500.00 el cuál lo canceló de manera puntual.
texts.en: Clemente is 45 years old and lives with his wife and children in their own home. They live in the disctrict of Zana, in the province of Chiclayo, department of Lambayeque, Peru. He has very good personal and work references. The inhabitants of this region work mainly in agriculture, commerce and livestock. He works raising and selling animals such as goats and lambs. He has been doing this work for more than 15 years, from his own home. He is requesting a loan to buy animals and animal feed. In this way he will grow his business more, earn more income, and be able to improve his quality of life. Clemente is a new member of  Edpyme Alternativa. He has had three loans. The last one was for 1,500 nuevo sols, and he repaid it punctually.

loans.use: to buy animals and animal feed.

loans.name: Fe Y Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Fe y Esperanza está en su ciclo número 19 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están además dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, cada una uniendo esfuerzos para poder superar su situación de pobreza.
Estefania es una persona muy trabajadora que quiere mejorar su vida, es por ello que decidió unirse a este grupo para poder dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, y que no pasen por necesidades como las que ella tuvo que pasar. Ella se dedica a la venta de pescados, y pide este préstamo para poder comprar pescados en cantidad, de manera a poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo y esforzándose así por mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
The group called Fe y Esperanza [Faith and Hope] is in its 19th cycle of the women’s committee program, where everyone works and helps one another get ahead. They are also in the program of poverty elimination, each one joining forces in order to be able to overcome their situation of poverty.

Estefanía is a very hardworking person who wants to improve her life, which is why she decided to join this group in order to be able to give her family a better quality of life, so that they might not have to endure the hardships that she had to go through. She sells fish, and is requesting this loan in order to be able to buy fish in quantity, so as to be able to continue with her sales as she has been doing and in this way strive to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: buy various fish to sell.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia con 35 años de edad,de estado civil casada, vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos, en el distrito de Nueva Arica,provincia de Chiclayo,departamento de Lambayeque,país Perú, en una zona rural. Ella cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona.Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales como patos, gallinas, gallos, pollos, cerdos, etc, con más de 5 años de experiencia en el rubro, su negocio está ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Solicita préstamo para la compra de más animales, dicha inversión le servirá para tener mayor variedad y productividad en animales, con gran influencia en el negocio.

Julia es socia recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa. Ha tenido dos créditos de S/.1000,00 y S/.1100,00 los cuáles los a cancelado de manera puntual.
texts.en:
Julia is 35, married, and lives with her husband and children, in the district of Nueva Arica, in the province of Chiclayo, in the department of Lambayeque, Peru, in a rural area. She has very good personal and work references among area residents. The people of this town work mostly in agriculture, trade, and livestock.

She works in the breeding and sales of animals such as ducks, hens, roosters, chickens, pigs, etc, with more than 5 years of experience in this occupation. Her business is located in her own home. She is applying for a loan to buy more animals. This investment will help her have a greater variety and productivity in animals, with great influence on her business.

Julia is recurrent partner with Alternative Edpyme. She has had two loans of 1000.00 and 1100.00 Peruvian Nuevo Sols [296.00 and 325.00 U.S. dollars], which she repaid on time.

loans.use: buy more animals.

loans.name: Marylu

texts.es:
Marylu con 50 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rústico, vive sóla, en el distrito de Pomahuaca,provincia de Jaén,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú, en una zona rural. Ella cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en general, con una experiencia en el rubro de 30 años. El destino del crédito será para invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de productos como aceite, leche, arroz,azúcar,etc, con ello le generará mayores ingresos y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida. Para este rubro no hay mayor competencia en la zona y con ello obtiene mejores precios.

Marylu es socia recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa, firma sóla.
texts.en:
Marylu, 50, lives in her own house of rustic materials. She lives alone, in the district of Pomahuaca, in the province of Jaen, in the department of Cajamarca, Peru, in a rural area. She has very good personal and work references among area residents. The people of this town work mostly in agriculture, trade, and livestock.

She works selling groceries, with 30 years’ experience in the business. The loan will be to invest in the purchase of more products such as oil, milk, rice, sugar, etc. This will generate more income for her and thus improve her quality of life. In this line of work there is no major competition in the area and she therefore obtains better prices.

Marylu is recurrent partner with Edpyme Alternativa; she is a sole signer.
.

loans.use: invest in the purchase of more products such as oil, milk, rice, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Justina

texts.es:
Justina con 57 años, de estado civil casada, vive en casa propia, junto a su esposo, en el distrito de Cayaltí,provincia de Chiclayo,departamento de Lambayeque,país Perú. Ella cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza como perfumes, cremas corporales,shampoos, entre otros, con una experiencia en el rubro desde hace más de 3 años. El préstamo lo utilizará en la compra de más productos para atender campaña. De esta manera obtendrá mayor venta y atención a clientes y así poder generar ingresos para una mejora en su calidad de vida de ella y la de su familia.

Justina es socia recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa, con pagos puntuales.
texts.en:
Justina, 57, is married, lives in her own home, with her husband, in the district of Cayaltí, province of Chiclayo, departament of Lambayeque, Perú. She has very good personal and work references among area residents. The people of this town work mostly in agriculture, trade, and livestock.

She sells beauty products like perfumes, body creams, shampoos, among others, with more than three years’ experience in this line of work. The loan will be used to buy more products to fill sales orders. In this manner she will obtain more sales and customer service and thus be able to generate revenue for an improvement in her quality of life and that of her family.

Justina is a recurrent partner with Edpyme Alternativa, with punctual payments.

loans.use: buy more products to fill sales orders.

loans.name: Angel

texts.es:
Ángel con 50 años de edad, de estado civil casado, vive en casa propia, junto a su esposa, en el distrito de Querocotillo,provincia de Cutervo,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú. El cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de café,de variedad Catimor, con una experiencia en el rubro de 15 años.El préstamo lo utilizará para capital de trabajo, específicamente para la compra de fertilizantes, deshierbo, pago de jornales.Esta inversión lo ayudará a tener mayor capital y así tener mayor liquidez para desarrollar su cultivo.

Ángeles socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Ángel, 50, is married and lives in his own house, with his wife, in the district of Querocotillo, province of Cutervo, department of Cajamarca, Perú. He has very good personal and work references among area residents. The people of this town work mostly in agriculture, trade, and livestock.

He works in agriculture, specifically the cultivation of coffee, of the Catimor variety, with 15 years’ experience in this line of work. He wil use the loan for working capital, specifically for the purchase of fertilizers, weeding, and the payment of labor. This investment will help him have more capital and thus have more liquidity to develop his cultivation.

Ángel is a recurrent partner with Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: with working capital, specifically for the purchase of fertilizers, weeding, and the payment of labor.

loans.name: George

texts.es:
George con 24 años de edad,de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa familiar de material rústico,junto a su cónyuge, en el distrito de Santo Tomás,provincia de Cutervo,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú. El cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la agricultura,específicamente al cultivo de café, de variedad Catimor, sembrando 1 hectárea de café de su propiedad,con una experiencia en el rubro desde hace más de 5 años. Adicionalmente se dedica a la cría y venta de animales menores y cultivo de productos de pan llevar.El destino del crédito será para invertir en el mantenimiento de su cultivo. De esta manera obtendrá un buen rendimiento y mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.

George es socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa. Firma con su cónyuge,
texts.en:
George, 24, is married and lives in a rural house with his wife in the district of Santo Tomas, Cutervo. This area falls under the Cajamarca office in Peru. He is well-regarded, both as a professional and as a person by the people in the area. Most of the population live on agriculture, commerce and livestock.

George grow crops, especially the Catimor variety of coffee. He has one hectare of land which he owns and dedicates to coffee. He has more than five years' experience in this field.

He also raises and sells small animals and grows common vegetables.

He will use this loan to invest in products to maintain his crops. This will help production and give him more income to be able to improve the quality of life for himself and his family.

He has applied for loans before with the Edpyme Alternativa organization and enters the agreement together with his wife.

loans.use: to maintain this crops.

loans.name: Felix

texts.en:
Felix resides in Kipsegech, a remote village in the lush hills of Nandihills, in the Rift Valley of Kenya. As the key breadwinner of his family he has been practicing mixed farming for the past 11 years. Because of the immense knowledge he has of farming, he commands a lot of respect from other farmers in his village. His primary sources of income have been milk, eggs, and crops. Although he has been making profits from farming, he has identified a “niche market” for selling cereals; the only big challenge he faces is lack of funds.

He is requesting a loan to buy cereals. He intends to buy different varieties of cereals; that is, maize, sorghum, rice, wheat, barley, and millet, to sell in the local market. Market for the cereals is never a problem because the demand is always high, and he plans to take advantage of that.

Because of the good relationship he has with his neighbors, he plans to increase his market by using word of mouth to reach more customers and markets. He plans that, through accumulated profits, he will be able to buy a milling machine for grinding maize. Through this loan, Felix’s life will take another turn, and he will be able to secure the future of his family. You can help this man achieve his dreams with this loan, which will surely bring big profits.

loans.use: To buy cereals

loans.name: Maruja

texts.es:
Maruja con 28 años de edad, de estado civil casada,vive en casa propia, junto a su esposo y sus hijos, en el distrito de Querecotillo,provincia de Cutervo,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú, en una zona rural. Ella cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la agricultura,específicamente al cultivo de café,de variedad Catimor, con una experiencia en el rubro de más de 6 años. El préstamo lo utilizará para capital de trabajo, específicamente para la compra de abonos y para realizar labores culturales en su finca de café. Esta inversión lo ayudará a tener mayor capital y así tener mayor liquidez para desarrollar la actividad mencionada.

Maruja es socia recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa, con 02 créditos los cuáles los canceló de manera puntual.
texts.en:
Maruja, 28, is married and lives in her own home with her husband and children in the district of Querecotillo, Cutervo. This area falls under the Cajamarca office in Peru. She is well-regarded, both as a professional and as a person by the people in the area. Most of the population live on agriculture, commerce and livestock.

She works in agriculture; in particular growing the Catimor variety of coffee. She has more than six years' experience in this field.

She will use the loan to buy compost and to look after her crops on her coffee plantations. This will give her more capital so she can have more cash flow to carry out the necessary work.

She has had two loans before with Edpyme Alternativa, both of which, she paid off on time.

loans.use: to buy compost and maintain her coffee crops.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.en:
Josefa is married and she is a businesswoman. She is very highly interested in doing business. She has been involved in business activities since a few years ago, with her own working capital, and she does her best with it. She is earning good money but she still wants to improve her management of her business.

She is taking a loan of $1000 from Tuba Rai Metin to buy more additional items to keep in her store including aqua, ketchup, sauces, cooking oil, tea, salt, cigarettes, candies, biscuits, soft drinks and other things to sell. She is happy with the loan that was offered from Tuba Rai Metin for her to have more working capital to buy more goods.

loans.use: to buy aqua, ketchup, sauces, cooking oil, tea, salt, cigarettes, candies, biscuits, soft drinks and other things to sell.

loans.name: Sochan

texts.en:
Sochan is a 31-year-old housewife and also the mother of two children. The man is her husband and he is a translator. They can only make $11 USD per day to support their family. Sochan resides in a rural area of Baribour District, Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in this career for nearly 10 years now.

Because it is hard to find a place to go to the toilet, she decided to apply for a Kiva loan through HKL to build a hygienic latrine for her house. She is very happy with this loan, since it will promote her health, the environment, and her living standards. She would like to thank all the lenders for their generosity.

loans.use: to build a hygienic latrine for her house

loans.name: Reynalda

texts.en:
Reynalda has been a farmer for a long period of time. She toils the land and grows rice. She resides in the town of Talibon. She is a widow and has five grown children.

She owns a rice paddy and sells rice to the local dwellers in her place. She faces challenges of the liquidity of capital and the high cost of farm maintenance in her livelihood.

Reynalda would like to purchase fertilizer and medicines. These would help to boost and improve the yield of her farm and to continue expanding it to become more sustainable in the future.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and medicines

loans.name: Victor Raul

texts.es:
Víctor Raúl con 29 años de edad, de estado civil soltero,vive en casa familiar, junto a su madre y padrastro,en el distrito de Cayaltí,provincia de Chiclayo,departamento de Lambayeque,país Perú. El cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica al servicio de transporte de pasajeros en mototaxi, en el distrito de Cayaltí y anexos, con una experiencia en el rubro desde hace más de 03 años. El destino del préstamo será para invertir en la compra de accesorios y para el mantenimiento de la mototaxi y otros gastos diversos.

Víctor Raúl es socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Victor Raul, 29, is single and lives with his mother and step-father in the family home in the district of Cayalti, Chiclayo. This area falls under the Lambayeque office in Peru. He is well-regarded, both as a professional and as a person by the people in the area. Most of the population live on agriculture, commerce and livestock.

He runs a transport service for passengers in his motor-taxi in Cayalti and the surrounding areas. He has more than three years' experience in this field.

He will use the loan to buy accessories and carry out repairs on his vehicle, as well as putting money towards other expenses.

He has had loans before with Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to buy accessories and carry out maintenance on his motor-taxi.

loans.name: Yrene

texts.es:
Yrene con 47 años de edad,de estado civil madre soltera,vive junto a su hijo,en el distrito de Oyotún,provincia de Chiclayo,departamento de Lambayeque,país Perú, en una zona rural. Ella cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de comida, con una experiencia en el rubro de más de 14 años, su negocio está ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Solicita préstamo para la compra de mobiliario sillas,mesas,etc, dicha inversión le servirá para que aumente su productividad y poder brindar un mejor servicio con gran influencia en el negocio. De esta manera piensa mejorar su productividad para poder atender las diversas necesidades y gustos de los clientes de la zona.

Yrene es socia recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa.Ha tenido dos créditos de S/.1500,00 y S/.1000,00 los cuáles los a cancelado de manera puntual.
texts.en:
Yrene, 47, is a single mother who lives with her son in the district of Oyotun, Chiclayo. This area falls under the Lambayeque office in Peru. She is well-regarded, both as a professional and as a person by the people in the area. Most of the population live on agriculture, commerce and livestock.

She makes and sells food for a living. She has more than 14 years' experience in this field. She runs her business from home.

She is asking for a loan to buy chairs, tables and other furniture so that she can offer a better service to her customers and improve productivity. She will be able to cater for the different needs of her customers in the area.

She has had loans before through Edpyme Alternativa. She received loans for 1500 nuevos soles and 1000 nuevos soles, both of which she paid off on time.

loans.use: to buy furniture for her food stall.

loans.name: Myrallen

texts.en:
Myrallen is 38 years old, married and a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Myrallen has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional fish nets and materials for boat repair.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Myrallen has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish nets and materials for boat repair

loans.name: Sidra

texts.en:
Sidra is the age of 31 years, living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She is the mother of three children.

She owns a beauty parlor and she is an expert in makeovers. Most of her clients belong to the neighborhood and they appreciate her services. With the passage of time her beauty products have been diminishing and this time she wants to buy more beauty products for her beauty salon.

Therefore, Sidra requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan, so she would be able to buy new cosmetics products such as facial cream, bleach cream, nail polish, hair color, lotion, etc. She wants to establish a parlor in the main market of town because she wants to enhance her income. Sidra says thanks to Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy new cosmetics products such as facial cream, bleach cream, nail polish, hair color, lotion, etc. for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Martina Segunda

texts.es:
Martina Segunda con 28 años de edad,de estado civil conviviente,vive en casa propia,junto a su cónyuge y sus hijas, en el distrito de Lagunas,provincia de Chiclayo,departamento de Lambayeque,país Perú. Ella cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

Ella de dedica a la crianza de ganado lechero,con una experiencia en el rubro desde hace varios años. Adicionalmente se dedica a la crianza y venta de carneros y pollos. Solicita préstamo para la compra de animales y alimentos para estos. De esta manera le facilitará seguir trabajando y así mismo mejorar sus propios ingresos.

Martina es socia reactivada para Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Martina Segunda, 28, is married and lives in her own home with her husband and daughters in the district of Lagunas, Chiclayo. This area falls under the Lambayeque office in Peru. She is well-regarded, both as a professional and as a person by the people in the area. Most of the population live on agriculture, commerce and livestock.

She raises milking cows and has several years' experience in this field. She also raises chickens and lambs.

She is asking for a loan to buy animals and food to feed them. This will allow her to carry on in business and generate a better income.

She has reapplied to Edpyme Alternativa for help with the loan system.

loans.use: to buy animals and food for them.

loans.name: Segundo

texts.es:
Segundo con 71 años de edad,de estado civil casado,vive en casa propia, junto a su esposa y su hija, en el distrito de Cayaltí,provincia de Chiclayo,departamento de Lambayeque,país Perú. El cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la actividad de la venta de cerveza,gaseosa y golosinas, con una experiencia en el rubro desde hace más 10 años,en su propio domicilio. Solicita préstamo para la compra de mercadería para su negocio como golosinas,gaseosas,leche,aceite,etc. De esta manera hacer crecer su negocio,obteniendo mayores ingresos y poder mejorar su calidad de vida.

Segundo es socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa, Ha tenido un préstamo de S/.1,500.00 el cuál lo canceló puntualmente.
texts.en:
Segundo, 71, is married and lives in his own home with his wife and daughter in Cayalti, Chiclayo. This area falls under the Lambayeque office in Peru. He is well-regarded, both as a professional and as a person by the people in the area. Most of the population live on agriculture, commerce and livestock.

He sells beer, soft drinks and sweets and has more than ten years' experience in this business. He runs his stall from his own home.

He is asking for a loan to buy groceries such as sweets, soft drinks, milk, oil and other things. This will help his business to grow so he can generate a better income and improve his quality of life.

He has had loans before through Edpyme Alternativa, paying off a previous loan of 1500 nuevos soles on time.

loans.use: to buy groceries for his store.

loans.name: Norce

texts.en:
Norce is a 37-year-old woman who lives with her husband Lasarus, 46, a bricklayer and four children. Two of them go to elementary school and their ages are between one and nine years old. To make more income for living Norce sells kerosene and it has been running for a year. She also tries to save part of the income for her children’s school fees.

Norce is looking for an opportunity to sell more kerosene as demanded by customers but the lack of capital led her to seek a loan. When a neighbor notified her about TLM and the loan product particularly for small entrepreneurs, she was interested and requested a loan of IDR 2,500,000 from TLM. She is happy that Kiva through TLM also involves helping poor people around the world.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of kerosene

loans.name: Korn's Group

texts.en: Korn’s Group lives in a rural village in Kampot Province in Cambodia. Korn makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a tailor to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Sixto Clodobeo

texts.es:
Sixto Clodobeo con 50 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rústico,junto a su cónyuge y su hijo, en el distrito de Santo Tomás,provincia de Cutervo,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú.Ella cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la agricultura,especificamente al cultivo de café, de variedad Catimor, contando a la fecha con 2 hectáreas resistente a enfermedades y plagas. Plantación está en su segundo y tercer año de producción, con una experiencia en el rubro desde hace 25 años. Adicionalmente se dedica a la cría y engorde de ganado vacuno, así mismo a la cría de animales menores (gallinas, cuyes, cerdo) y cultivo de productos de pan llevar (yuca, plátano, vituca) para su consumo y en ocasiones para la venta y ademas trabaja como peón agrícola. El destino del crédito será para invertir en el mantenimiento y cultivo de 1 hectárea de café en producción, asegurando una buena producción para campaña 2016, reflejado en un mayor volumen de ventas y por ende obtendrá mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar calidad de vida de él y de su familia.

Sixto Clodobeo es socio nuevo para Edpyme Alternativa. Firma con su cónyuge.
texts.en:
Sixto Clodobeo, 50, lives in his own rustic home with his wife and son in Santo Tomas, Cutervo. This area falls under the Cajamarca office in Peru. He is well-regarded, both as a professional and as a person by the people in the area. Most of the population live on agriculture, commerce and livestock.

He works in agriculture, in particular growing coffee. He has two hectares which are in a healthy state, free of disease and plagues. His hectares are now in their second and third years of production, and he has more than 25 years' experience in this field.

He also raises and fattens livestock, as well as smaller animals such as hens, guinea pigs and pigs. In addition, he grows basic products such as yucca, bananas and a local plant called taro.

He uses the food to feed his family and sells any excess. On occasions, he can also work as a land laborer.

He will use the loan to maintain and cultivate one hectare of coffee, so that he has good productivity for 2016, with more sales. This will generate more income so he can improve the standard of living for his family.

He has had loans before with Edpyme Alternativa and enters the agreements with his wife.

loans.use: to maintain and cultivate his coffee crops.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.en: Alberto is 41 years old, married, and has four children. He is able to sustain the needs of his family by farming. He borrowed a loan to buy chemicals for farming. Now he is starting to work on the farm for planting preparation and to harvest a good crop in due time. He wants to give his family a better life and provide his children a good future.

loans.use: to buy chemicals for farming.

loans.name: Anjelah

texts.en: Anjelah is a Kiva borrower. She describes herself to be reliable. She operates a retail business where she sells clothes. She has been involved in this business for four years. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be low stock. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more stock of clothes. Her business goal is to have a stable business within five years. This is her fourth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Previous loans were repaid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of clothes

loans.name: Tha's Group

texts.en: Tha’s Group lives in a rural village in Kanpot Province in Cambodia. Tha makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these people to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Nargis

texts.en:
Nargis is a 33-year-old married woman and the mother of four children. She is a hardworking and independent mother who is helping her family by providing tailoring services at her home. She has been doing it for the past ten years. She knows the techniques of stitching very well. She sews garments for nearest factories. Her husband brings cloth from the factory. She earns enough to lead a decent life.

To help her continue operations of her business, she requested a loan to buy a new Juki sewing machine because her previous sewing machine has become out of order due to continuously working. Moreover, she wants to purchase a new Juki machine that will be useful for providing fast and more efficient stitching work. Nargis thanks Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan

loans.use: to buy a new Juki sewing machine for her tailoring services.

loans.name: Jose Inelso

texts.es:
José Inelso con 26 años de edad, vive en casa familiar, de material rústico, junto a sus padres y hermano, en el distrito de Pimpingos,provincia de Cutervo,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú. El cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la agricultura,especificamente al cultivo de café,contando a la fecha con 2 hectáreas de variedad Catimor, resistente a enfermedades y plagas, plantación está en su segundo y cuarto año de producción, cultivo de café lo realiza en terreno propio. Adicionalmente se dedica a la cría de animales menores (gallinas, cuyes, cerdo) y cultivo de productos de pan llevar (yuca, plátano, vituca) para su consumo y en ocaciones para la venta. Además trabaja como peón agrícola. El destino del crédito será para invertir en el mantenimiento y cultivo de 1,5 hectárea de café en producción, de las 2 hectáreas que cuenta y así asegurando una buena producción para campaña 2016, reflejado en un mayor volumen de ventas y por ende obtendrá mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar calidad de vida de él y de su familia.

José Inelso es socio nuevo para Edpyme Alternativa.Firma con aval.
texts.en:
José Inelso, 26, lives in his rustic home with his parents and brother in Pimpingos, Cutervo. This area falls under the Cajamarca office in Peru. He is well-regarded, both as a professional and as a person by the people in the area. Most of the population live on agriculture, commerce and livestock.

He works in agriculture, mainly in the production of coffee. He has two hectares at his disposal and he grows the Catimor variety. His crops are in a healthy state, free of diseases and pests. His plantations are in their second and fourth years of production and he owns the land they are on.

Apart from this, he also raises small animals, such as hens, guinea pigs and pigs; he grows basic food, like bananas, yucca and taro, for his own consumption and selling any excess.

At times, he also works as a land laborer.

He will use the loan to maintain and cultivate 1.5 hectares of the coffee he has in production so that he has plenty of productivity for 2016. This will increase sales and improve the standard of living for all his family.

He is new to Edpyme Alternativa and signs with a guarantor.

loans.use: to maintain and cultivate his coffee crops.

loans.name: Liên's Group

texts.en:
Liên is 30 years old and she is married with two children. She lives in Thanh Hoa City, an urban town in Thanh Hoa Province. Her family is a low-income household in the village; moreover the market need is low in this region.

She has had a retail business selling clothes for three years. The main hardship that Liên faces is lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase more clothes to resell.

In 2013, Liên joined Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution to improve her business. She has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution. She is the group leader of Liên's Group, which consists of three members.

With her business profit, Liên hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes to resell

loans.name: Medius

texts.en:
Medius is married. She deals in produce, specifically cassava flour which is the staple food for people living in Kasese, giving a readily available market for her product. She has been in this business for five years now.

Medius is doing very well in her business. Because of the high demand and the fact that we are approaching the Christmas season, the clients are overwhelming and the available stock can no longer sustain them. She is requesting a Kiva loan through Hofokam Limited to buy more cassava flour to sell.

loans.use: to buy flour to sell.

loans.name: Iris Aracely

texts.es:
Iris, continua desarrollando su negocio de venta de pupusas y comercialización de granos básicos, con la facilidad de recursos económicos que le dio el crédito anterior ella ha podido tener materia prima para atender a sus clientes, sus nuevos ingresos le han permitido disminuir las necesidades de su familia y ha cancelado parte de sus deudas, su familia mantiene el mismo núcleo.
Pera tener un negocio con la capacidad de satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes nuevamente requiere de un crédito con el que comprara maíz, frijoles, arroz, aceite, tomates, condimentos, entre otros materiales con los que seguirá vendiendo pupusas y granos básicos, se siente optimista en que seguirá progresando.
texts.en:
Iris is still in the business of selling 'pupusas' and basic grains. She was able to use the last loan to have raw materials so that she could satisfy her customers' demand.

This has led to her being able to take care of household expenses and paying off some debts.

Her family remain the same.

In order to keep meeting her customers' needs, she is applying for a new loan so she can buy corn, beans, rice, oil, tomatoes, condiments and other things. This will allow her to carry on making her 'pupusas' and selling basic grains.

She feels happy and optimistic that her business is growing.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food sales.
